text: Lyudmila Aleksandrovna Ocheretnaya (born 6 January 1958) is the former wife of Russian President Vladimir Putin. The couple were married from 1983 to 2014. == Early life == She was born on 6 January 1958 in Kaliningrad, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Russia Category:People from Kaliningrad
title: Lyudmila Putina
